pullrequest.title: Fix missing shadows and normal maps when using ogre 1.9

content.raw:
Creating new paths while configuring the build which depends on external versions is no good for maintenance and debugging but if you are asking from a packaging point of view, since they are installing under the same path, I can not see any critical problem.

A minor note: when you say `ogre-1.8 cannot live along side ogre-1.9` that is true for development packages (libogre-1.X-dev). But the binary shared library packages (libogre-1.X) for versions 1.8 and 1.9 can be installed at the same time.
